about_text: Hi, I'm Fabs, a Software Engineer with practical experience in machine learning (CNNs, Random Forest) and full-stack development. I enjoy working across the stack and my favorite programming languages are Rust, Python, and TypeScript. I'm especially passionate about building integration systems and solving complex problems through collaboration.
contact_me_text: Feel free to reach out to me for any inquiries or collaborations. I am always open to new opportunities and challenges.
contact_me_text_2: You can find me on LinkedIn or GitHub, or you can send me an email directly.
contact_me_text_3: I look forward to hearing from you!
